name: zabbix
description: Zabbix is an enterprise-grade self-hosted monitoring platform for servers, applications, and networks. It collects metrics, sends alerts, and visualizes data on dashboards, with both on-prem and cloud-hosted offerings.
features: Agent-based monitoring: Deploy lightweight agents on servers to collect detailed system metrics and application data.
Agentless monitoring: Monitor network devices, services, and applications using SNMP, IPMI, and other protocols without agents.
Custom metrics: Define and collect custom metrics using scripts, APIs, or database queries for specialized monitoring.
Alerting system: Configure multi-level escalations with email, SMS, and webhook notifications based on trigger conditions.
Dashboard builder: Create custom dashboards with graphs, maps, and widgets to visualize infrastructure health.
Template library: Use pre-built monitoring templates for common applications and devices or create custom templates.
Distributed monitoring: Scale to thousands of hosts using proxy servers that aggregate data from remote locations.
Trend analysis: Store historical data and analyze long-term trends with built-in reporting and forecasting.
Network discovery: Automatically detect and add new devices to monitoring using network scanning and SNMP discovery.
SLA reporting: Track service level agreements with uptime calculations and availability reports.
API integration: Automate configuration and data retrieval using comprehensive REST API for external integrations.
High availability: Deploy in clustered configurations with failover support for mission-critical monitoring.
